reviewText: I liked it lot. Low expectations. Did not read the novel. The dread was parking garage threatening.

I didn't like the movie at all. It went in the trash after it tried to watch it. It's such a wonderful novel. The movie was filled with drug references and lots of extra content that was not in the book. Bad acting and overdone drama.  A real disappointment.

This story by Stephen King ought to be more compelling and scary, but somehow it just drags on and never really accomplishes what it set out to do.  I don't fault the great cast, but I do fault the weak adaptation.  Maybe this is one of those books that just could not be adapted well.
